public class BannerDescription

Internal class for managing banner data.

Copyright Smaato Inc. 2007, 2008

Constructor Detail

BannerDescription

public BannerDescription(long id,
                         java.lang.String type,
                         boolean canBeCached,
                         java.lang.String logId,
                         long startTime,
                         long endTime,
                         int maxViews,
                         BannerAction action)
Creates a new description

Parameters:
id - the ID of the banner
type - the type of the banner
canBeCached - true when the banner can be cached
logId - the logging ID used for reporting
startTime - the time when the banner begins to become active
endTime - the time when the banner expires
maxViews - the maximum number of views
action - the associated action that should be triggered when the banner is clicked

BannerDescription

public BannerDescription()
Creates an empty description which is then populated within read(). Don't use directly.

See Also:
read(DataInputStream)
